CTA.value: Want to create a cutting-edge platform like Herohero, or build something else?

fields.Name: Herohero

Image.filename: Copy of Copy of Copy of Copy of Untitled Design (3).png

fields.Description (from Notion):
I was the main frontend developer creating the user interface for the [Herohero](https://about.herohero.co/en/) platform. In this project, I had the privilege of using the latest technology of Vue 3 and Vite. I optimized for fast boot, snappy page and non-page transitions, and good scroll restoration in this modern web single page app. I created a custom media player with timestamp support, advanced upload manager and integrated the [Stripe](https://stripe.com/en-cz) payment gateway.

Herohero had a rapid growth in Czech Republic and Slovakia and eventually became the [dominant platform](https://www.focus-age.cz/m-journal/aktuality/mikyr-a-ti-dalsi--poznejte-nejlepe-vydelavajici-tvurce-na-herohero__s288x17493.html) for content monetisation.
